attributes.action: As growing Alevis around the UK. We would like a Community Centre in Sheffield.
attributes.additional_details: There are a lot of Centres in London which belong to Britain Alevi Federation we would like to be continueing with this in Sheffield.
attributes.background: As a growing Community in Sheffield we have a very small private rented Centre at the moment and it does not have the capasity for us to go ahead with our belief and support our worship. Our kids do not have enough space neither disabled members. Please look into this.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision to build a Community Centre is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

http://democracy.sheffield.gov.uk/mgepetitionlistdisplay.aspx?bcr=1
